trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> is an extension for providing a host <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReferenceEnvironment"></xref> containing objects that can be dereferenced by a string name.
Values provided through a <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> are not persisted.
Persistence of <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> values is a host responsibility.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> class.
Adds a symbol using the specified key/value pair.
The symbol to add.
Adds a symbol using the specified symbol name and value.
The name of the symbol.
The value of the symbol to reference.
Adds a symbol using the specified symbol name and type.
The symbol is added with the default value for the specified type.
The name of the symbol.
The type of the symbol value.
Adds a symbol using the specified symbol name, value, and type.
The name of the symbol.
The value of the symbol to reference.
The type of the symbol value.

Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReferenceEnvironment"></xref> instance that enables access to references of symbol values in <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> represented as <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref> objects.

A location reference that enables access to references to symbol values in <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> represented as <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref> objects.
Removes all symbols from the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> contains the specified symbol.
The symbol as a key/value pair to locate in the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> contains the specified symbol; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> contains a symbol with the specified key.
The key of the symbol to locate.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> contains a symbol with the specified key; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the symbols in the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> to an existing one-dimensional array of key/value pairs, starting at the specified array index.
The one-dimensional array of key/value pairs to copy the symbols to.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in the destination array at which copying begins.
Gets the number of symbols contained in the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
The number of symbols contained in the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection of key/value pairs where the keys are the symbol names and values the symbol values.
An enumerator that iterates through a collection of key/value pairs.
Gets a value that indicates whether the dictionary of symbols in the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> is read-only.
This property always returns `false`.
`false`.
Gets or sets the value of the item associated with the specified key.
The key of the item.
The value of the item associated with the specified key.
Gets a collection of all keys in the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
A collection of all keys in the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
Removes the specified symbol from the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
The symbol to remove.
`true` if the symbol is successfully found and removed; otherwise, `false`.
This method returns `false` if the symbol is not present.
Removes a symbol from the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> using a specified key.
The key of the symbol to remove.
`true` if the symbol is successfully found and removed; otherwise, `false`.
This method returns `false` if the symbol is not present.
Gets the value associated with the specified key.
The key of the value to get.
When this method returns, contains the value associated with the specified key, if the key is found; otherwise, the default value for the type of the value parameter.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref> contains an element with the specified key; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a collection of all values in the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
A collection of all values in the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection of key/value pairs where the keys are the symbol names and values the symbol values.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
An enumerator that iterates through a collection of key/value pairs.
